document.title: Wheelchair Service Provision Case Study - Meeting the Wheelchair Users Needs
document.section: Wheelchair Service Provision Case Study - Meeting the Wheelchair Users Needs Original Editor-Naomi O'Reillyas part of theWheelchair Service Provision Content Development Project Top Contributors-Naomi O'ReillyandKim Jackson

Wheelchair Users
Roger; Working in a supermarket; stocking shelves
Ruan; Walking with his Mum and dog
James (Number 14) and Team Mates; Playing wheelchair basketball
Mark; Working in an upholstery workshop
Dawid and Pinky; Working as security guards in a supermarket
Faizel; Works in an office
Keith (Three-wheel wheelchair) and Ralph (Four-wheel wheelchair); Work in a wheelchair assembly workshop
Ryan; Getting in and out of a car
Jenee; Dancing
